name: Moonbound (Alchemical Apples, WiredOverload)
description:
MoonBound is a game about the solid rock that cryptocurrency markets are built on. MoonBound is also a game about how that rock shakes around occasionally explodes.

 Your hero is stuck in a world in which stats are represented by various cryptocurrencies that need to be invested in at the right time. When a stat's crypto market is high, it's effect is stronger, but it's also much more expensive.

Beware, enemies also have their stats invested in crypto and sudden market swings can bring danger! Different enemies decide to invest in different markets, so a small goblin can because incredibly fast, while a cyber goblin can because incredibly strong.

Enemies that have invested in a market that is doing very well are represented with sparkles, they are more dangerous but can drop more money as their portfolio is worth more!

Controls:
WASD / arrow keys to move
Space / left click to attack
Tab to check the markets

@WiredOverload(Programming, Art)
@AlchemicalApples(Programming, Art)
